data.value: A parent item with a <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' may not contain a child item.

If <netWeight> is populated on both parent and child items, then <netWeight> of the parent shall be greater than or equal to the sum of the <netWeight> of all the children except when special item code = 'DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT'.
If <grossWeight> and <netWeight> are provided on the same record, <grossWeight> must be greater than or equal to <netWeight>
Sum of <quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem> shall equal <totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem> except when special item code = 'DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT'.
Attribute <dataRecipient> is required to be populated in a Catalogue Item Notification (CIN) message.
Gross Weight <grossWeight> must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero when Shipping Unit Indicator <isTradeItemADespatchUnit> equals 'TRUE'.
<isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit> must be 'TRUE' for at least one GTIN within a hierarchical configuration.
<minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction> must be greater than or equal to <minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival>.

Alcohol Percentage <percentageOfAlcoholByVolume> is not used. For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, this attribute is required for all items on the lowest level of the hierarchy for Global Product Category Code <gpcCategoryCode> <<gpcCategoryCode> <gpcCategoryName>>.
If <dangerousGoodsRegulationCode> equals 'ADR' and <dangerousGoodsPackingGroup> is not empty then <dangerousGoodsPackingGroup> must equal ('NA','I', 'II' or 'III').
Dates in <start date attribute> and <end date attribute> are not consistent. The end date <end date value> cannot be earlier than the start date <start date value>.
Values in <minimum attribute> and <maximum attribute> are not consistent. The maximum <maximum value> cannot be smaller than the minimum value <minimum value>.
If the item does not have a child item, the value of <isTradeItemABaseUnit> must be 'TRUE'.
If the trade item has a child item the value of <isTradeItemABaseUnit> must be 'FALSE'.
If populated, <percentageOfAlcoholByVolume> must be greater than or equal to 0.00 and smaller than or equal to 100.00 by definition.

If <classOfDangerousGoods> is populated and <dangerousGoodsRegulationCode> equals 'ADR', then <classOfDangerousGoods> must be one of the following values: '1', '2', '3', '4.1', '4.2', '4.3', '5.1', '5.2', '6.1', '6.2', '7', '8', '9'.

If <isTradeItemPackedIrregularly> equals 'FALSE' and <tradeItemCompositionWidth>, <tradeItemCompositionDepth> and <quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem> are all supplied and <measurementUnitCode> and <measurementUnitCode> equal 'EA' then the product of the three attributes should equal the <totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem>.
If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH', then <netContent> must not be updated.
If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH', then <priceComparisonMeasurement> must not be updated.
The value for <brandName> is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules.
If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH', then <totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem> must not be updated.
<childTradeItem> GTIN is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules.
The GTIN cannot be a child of itself.
If <targetMarketCountryCode> is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then the Trade Item Group ID Description must be the same for all GTINs within a Trade Item Group ID.
Zero or negative values are not allowed for Packaging Material Composition Quantity where provided.
For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) starting with '002', '004', '02' are not allowed.
For each GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the Contained Product.

If Irregularly Configured Pallet Indicator <isTradeItemPackedIrregularly> equals 'FALSE', then Total Count of All Products <totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem> must be equal to Number of Layers per GTIN <quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem> multiplied by Number of Units per Layer in a GTIN <quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer>.
If <dataCarrierTypeCode> is equal to 'EAN_8' then the first six digits of the <GTIN> shall equal '000000'.
The Target Market Country Code and <targetMarketSubdivisionCode> when populated, will be consistent for all GTINs within a given hierarchy.
For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, the unit of measure for <attribute> must be specified in degrees Celsius.
If <nestingIncrement> is populated it must be greater than zero(0).
For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, Stacking Factor <stackingFactor> must be less than 100.
For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, Stacking Factor for non-GTIN Pallet <logisticsUnitStackingFactor> must be less than 100.
For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, Number of Layers per non-GTIN Pallet <quantityOfLayersPerPallet> must be less than 999.
<endAvailabilityDateTime> shall be later than or equal to today on first population.
<discontinuedDateTime> must only be updated with <documentCommand> of 'CORRECT'.
<lastChangeDateTime> for a trade item must be the same or later than previously sent value.
Maximum and minimum humidity shall be expressed as a percentage with a value between '0' and '100'.
There is a limit of 1000 Transactions within 1 Message.
If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then <height> shall not be 20 percent greater than current version height.
If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then <width> shall not be 20 percent greater than current version width.
If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then <depth> shall not be 20 percent greater than current version depth.

If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then <grossWeight> shall not be 20 percent greater than current version <grossWeight>.
Maximum number of iterations of GDSNTradeItemClassificationAttributeType is 25.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, at least one value of Packaging Material Quantity <packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity> must have gram (GRM) or kilogram (KGM) defined as the unit of measure.
The total of values in <packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity> may not exceed the value in <packagingWeight> for the same item .

<length> <depth> must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if <isTradeItemNonphysical> equals 'FALSE' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.

Height <height> must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if <isTradeItemNonphysical> equals 'FALSE' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.

Width <width> must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if <isTradeItemNonphysical> equals 'FALSE' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.
Negative values are not allowed for Gross Weight.
Zero or negative values are not allowed for Net Weight where Net Weight is Provided.

If (Audio Visual Media Product Description Module or Publication Title Rating Module or Audio Visual Media Content Information Module) are used and <gpcCategoryCode> is equal to '10001137' then <audioVisualMediaProductTitle> , <genreTypeCodeReference> , <titleRatingCodeReference>/Code, <codeListAgencyCode> and <gameFormatCode> shall be used.
If <targetMarketCountryCode> is equal to '752' (Sweden) <layerHeight> must have the same value as one of the values in width, depth or height of the child item.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals '752' (Sweden) <priceBasisQuantity> may be specified with the following units of measures: kilogram, gram , metre, millimetre, millilitre, litre, square metre, cubic metres,piece.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> is equal to '752' (Sweden), <additionalTradeItemIdentificationValue> ('SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED', 'DISTRIBUTOR_ASSIGNED') may not have the same value on more than one Trade Item in the same item hierarchy. This rule applies when <isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit> is equal to 'TRUE'.
If <dataCarrierTypeCode> equals ('EAN_13', 'UPC_A' or 'UPC_E') then first digit of gtin shall equal '0'.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, Net Content <netContent> is mandatory on consumer units (Consumer Unit Indicator <isTradeItemAConsumerUnit> equals to 'TRUE').
If provided, <orderingLeadTime> must be greater than zero.
If Target Market is '036' (Australia) and <taxTypeCode> is equal to 'WET' (Wine Equalisation Tax), then <percentageOfAlcoholByVolume> must be populated.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, if Number of Units per Layer in a Non-GTIN Pallet <quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer> is used, then Number of Layers per Non-GTIN Pallet <quantityOfLayersPerPallet> must be used.
<functionalName> may not contain the same text as <brandName> or <descriptiveSizeDimension> when IsTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'TRUE'.
<dutyfeeTaxCategoryCode> was not used.
If populated, <minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival> must be greater than zero.
If populated, <minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction> must be greater than zero.
Value in <grossWeight> shall be greater than or equal to value in <netContent> if this is given as weight. Allowance shall be made for different units of measure.

Value in <quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem> may not exceed 2 when the pallet type is any type of full size pallet and the child item's pallet type is any type of half size pallet. Full size pallets are: ISO 1 Pallet (code 11)
{insert_attribute_name} contains an invalid value. Used code {insert_incorrect_value} is not included in the relevant external code list'.
{insert_attribute_name} contains an invalid value. Used code {insert_incorrect_value} is not included in the relevant GS1 code list'.
If <individualUnitMinimum> and/or <individualUnitMaximum> are populated, then <isTradeItemABaseUnit> must be 'TRUE'.
If <isTradeItemABaseUnit> is equal to 'FALSE', then <individualUnitMinimum> and/or <individualUnitMaximum> should never be populated.
Gross Weight <grossWeight> must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if <isTradeItemNonphysical> equals 'FALSE' or is not used.
The GTIN's Gross Weight <grossWeight> shall be greater than 96% of the sum of the GTIN's Packaging Weight <packagingWeight> and the Gross Weight <grossWeight> of all its next lower-level child items.
If <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> is 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', and the item has a parent, then the <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.
If <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> is 'PALLET', and the item has a parent, then the <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD' or 'PALLET'.
If <tradeItemUnitDescriptor> is 'PALLET', and the item has a children, then the <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.
If <tradeItemUnitDescriptor> is 'CASE', and the item has a parent, then the <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' or 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK.'.
If <tradeItemUnitDescriptor> is 'CASE' and the item has a children, then the <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'MIXED_MODULE' or 'PALLET'.
If <tradeItemUnitDescriptor> is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK' and the item has a parent, then the <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH'.

If <tradeItemUnitDescriptor> is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK', and the item has (a) child(ren), then the <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'PALLET', 'MIXED_MODULE', 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'CASE'.
<stackingFactor> is mandatory for Despatch Units in target market '752' (Sweden).
If populated, one iteration has to be in Swedish for <functionalName> for TM '752' (Sweden).
For this target market <<targetMarketCountryCode>>, <fileFormatName> is mandatory, if <uniformResourceIdentifier> is used and <referencedFileTypeCode> equals the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE'.

<fileName> is mandatory if <uniformResourceIdentifier> is used and <typeOfInformation> contains the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE' unless <targetMarketCountryCode> equals 756 (Switzerland), 276 (Germany), 040 (Austria), 528 (Netherlands).
The <dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode> must be '9SE' if target market is '752' (Sweden).
<lastChangeDateTime> for a trade item may not be a date in the future.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, if Global Product Category Code <gpcCategoryCode> is not in GPC Segment '51000000' (Healthcare) and Consumer Unit Indicator <isTradeItemAConsumerUnit> equals 'TRUE', then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) <gtin>> must start with '0'.

If <isNonGTINLogisticUnitPackedIrregularly> is equal to 'FALSE' then value in <quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet> shall be equal to value in <quantityOfLayersPerPallet> multiplied by value in <quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer>
<importClassificationTypeCode> and <importClassificationValue> are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.
<importClassificationTypeCode> and <importClassificationValue> are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.
If <quantityOfLayersPerPallet> is greater than zero, then <quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer> shall be greater than zero for this target market.
If <targetMarket> equals '840' (US) and <growingMethodCode> equals 'ORGANIC' then <organicClaimAgency> and <organicTradeItemCode> MUST not be empty.
<tradeItemDescription> is missing. The long description <tradeItemDescription> is mandatory for <<<targetMarketCountryCode> Name>>.

<platformTypeCode> is missing. If <targetMarketCountryCode> does not equal ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand) or 752 (Sweden)) it is mandatory to specify the pallet type <platformTypeCode> when <tradeItemUnitDescriptor> is equal to 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE'.
For target market '250' (France), the country of origin is required for all base units <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH'.
When target market code equals '250' (France) the agency maintaining the list of taxes is GS1 France. (<dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode> = '65').
The free quantity <freeQuantityOfProduct> in a promotional offer shall not exceed the Content net <netContent>, when expressed in the same <measurementUnitCode>.
If the net drained weight is populated <drainedWeight> the net weight must be less than or equal to its net weight <netWeight>.
If a trade item has a child trade item <tradeItemIdentification>, the amount associated with this child <tradeItemIdentification> shall be informed and be greater than 0.

If target Market equals '250' (France)), consumer units for alcoholic beverages (Cls '50202200' , except Brick '10000142') shall have a <dutyFeeTaxTypeCode> equal to '3001000002541' (Rights on pre-mixes), '3001000002244' (Tax on cider), '3001000002312' (Rights of alcohol) or '3001000002329'.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals '372' (Ireland) and if <isTradeItemABaseUnit> equals 'TRUE' and ((<gpcCategoryCode> is in Class ('50202200' or '50211500') and does not equal ('10000142', '10000143', '10000303' or '10000584')) then at least one iteration of AdditionalTradeItemClassification shall have a value with <additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode> equal to '57'(REV).
If <depositValueEffectiveDate> is populated then <returnablePackageDepositIdentification> or <returnablePackageDepositAmount> MUST be populated.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name> and Consumer Product Variant Start <Time> <consumerProductVariantStartEffectiveDateTime> is used, then Consumer Product Variant Description <consumerProductVariantDescription> shall be used.
<returnableAssetCapacityContent> is missing.
<discontinuedDateTime> shall not be older than <effectiveDateTime> minus six months.
A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED_BY')
A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('SUBSTITUTED_BY')
A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('EQUIVALENT')
Dependent Proprietary Trade Item (''DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY') shall not equal <tradeItemIdentification>.
A trade item can not be the same as the item variant master ('ITEM_VARIANT_MASTER')
A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED').
If the Trade Item is a consumer unit, and the target market country code is '840' (US), the type of bar code <dataCarrierTypeCode> is mandatory.
GLN for <informationProvider> is missing.
The name of the information provider shall be populated.
The <startAvailabilityDateTime> must be populated for the trade item.
Consumer Unit Indicator <isTradeItemAConsumerUnit> must not be empty.
<isTradeItemADespatchUnit> must be populated for the trade item.
<isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit> must be populated for the trade item.
Variable Measure Indicator <isTradeItemAVariableUnit> must not be empty.
If the drained weight is populated <drainedWeight> it must be less than or equal to the gross weight <grossWeight>.

<targetMarket> for a child item cannot be more specific than for the parent. Example: If parent item <targetmarketCountryCode> is equal to '840' then child item cannot have a <targetMarketSubdivisonCode>.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name> then <packagingMaterialTypeCode> and <packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity> are used in pairs. I.e. if one is populated the other one must be populated, also.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item Height <height> shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item Width <width> shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item Depth <depth> shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item Net Weight <netWeight> shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item Gross Weight <grossWeight> shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item Packaging Weight <packagingWeight> shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item Drained Weight <drainedWeight> shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
If <fatPercentageInDryMatter> is not empty then value must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100.00.
<discontinuedDateTime> and <cancelledDateTime> shall not be used simultaneously .
If <additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode> equals 'GTIN_13' then associated <additionalTradeItemIdentification> value must have 13 digits and must have a valid check digit.
If <additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode> equals 'GTIN_8' then associated <additionalTradeItemIdentification> value must have 8 digits and must have a valid check digit.
If <additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode> equals 'GTIN_14' then associated <additionalTradeItemIdentification> value must have 14 digits and must have a valid check digit.
If <additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode> equals 'GTIN_12' then associated <additionalTradeItemIdentification> value must have 12 digits and must have a valid check digit.
There must be at most one iteration per language.
There must be at most one iteration per unit.

If Packaging Material Type Code <packagingMaterialTypeCode> does not equal ('COMPOSITE', 'METAL_COMPOSITE', 'LAMINATED_CARTON', 'PAPER_PAPERBOARD' or 'OTHER') then CompositeMaterialDetail class must not be used.
Use of <temperatureTypeQualifierCode> is mandatory in case any other attribute of the TradeItemTemperatureInformation class is not empty.
The maximum length of data type <StringAttributeValuePair> is 5000 characters.
<descriptiveSizeDimension>, <sizeDimension> or <sizeCode> is missing.
The Brand Name <brandName> must not be empty unless the context is 'Pharmaceuticals' or 'Medical Devices'.
Product Type Description <functionalName> must not be empty.
Product Type Description <functionalName> must not be empty.
If <maximumHumidityPercentage> and/or <minimumHumidityPercentage> are not empty then <humidityQualifierCode> must not be empty.
If <gln> is not empty then <brandOwner>/PartyRoleCode shall be empty.
If <gln> is used then <partyRoleCode> shall be empty.
If <gln> and/or <partyName> is used then <partyRoleCode> shall be empty.
If <tradeItemPrice> is used then <tradeItemPriceTypeCode> shall be empty.
If <tradeItemPrice> is used then <tradeItemPriceTypeCode> shall be empty.

If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then Height <height> must not be less than 80 percent of the current version height.

If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then Width <width> must not be less than 80 percent of the current version width.

If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then Depth <depth> shall not be less than 80 percent of the current version depth.

If <preliminaryItemStatusCode> does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then Gross Weight <grossWeight> shall not be less than 80 percent of the current version Gross Weight <grossWeight>.
<partyRoleCode> is mandatory in <tradeItem>/PartyInRole class.
For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name> and Product Yield <productYield> is used, then Preparation Type Code <preparationTypeCode> shall be used.
If <productYield> is not empty then <productYieldTypeCode> must not be empty.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name> and Nonphysical Unit Indicator <isTradeItemNonphysical> equals 'FALSE' or is not used, and Service Indicator <isTradeItemAService> equals 'FALSE' or is not used, and one iteration of Trade Channel Code <tradeItemTradeChannelCode> equals to ('CASH_AND_CARRY', 'CONSIGNMENT', 'CONVENIENCE', 'DRUG_STORE', 'FOOD_SERVICE', 'GROCERY', 'ONLINE' or 'UNSPECIFIED') or Trade Channel Code is not used, then Despatch Unit Indicator <isTradeItemADespatchUnit> shall equal 'TRUE' for at least one GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) in the hierarchy.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name> and for the same Tax Type Code <dutyFeeTaxTypeCode> the range of <dutyFeeTaxEffectiveStartDateTime> and <dutyFeeTaxEffectiveEndDateTime> SHALL NOT overlap.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <gpcCategoryCode> equals '10000424' and <isTradeItemAConsumerUnit> equals 'TRUE' then at least one iteration of <priceComparisonContentTypeCode> shall equal 'PER_KILOGRAM' or 'PER_LITRE'.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals '250' (France) and <isTradeItemAConsumerUnit> equals 'TRUE' and if <priceComparisonContentTypeCode> equals 'PER_PIECE' then <priceComparisonMeasurement> shall be an Integer.
For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, if <priceComparisonMeasurement> is used, then <priceComparisonMeasurement> shall be greater than 0.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals 'PALLET' and <platformTypeCode> equals '10', then depth shall be between and including ('800 MMT' or '31.50 IN') and ('1600 MMT' or '63 IN') and width shall be between and including (' '600 MMT' or '23.62 IN') and ('1200 MMT' or '47.24 IN').
When populating Net Weight <netWeight>, Drained Weight <drainedWeight> or Gross Weight <grossWeight>, the associated <measurementUnitCode> shall be of the Unit Of Measure Classification 'MASS'.
If Height <height> or Depth <depth> or Width <width> is not empty, then the unit of measurement shall be expressed in a UOM from the Unit Of Measure Classification 'DIMENSIONS'.
Associated <measurementUnitCode> of <priceComparisonMeasurement> and/or of one iteration of <netContent> is/are not from the Unit Of Measure Classification 'VOLUME'.
If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <dutyFeeTaxTypeCode> equals '3001000002282' then <dutyFeeTaxRate> shall be empty and <dutyFeeTaxAmount> shall be used.
If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals '250' (France) and <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals'PALLET', then <height> shall be less than or equal to '3 MTR'.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <height> or <width> or <depth> is not empty and the associated <measurementUnitCode> equals 'MTR', then its associated value shall not have more than 3 decimal positions.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <height> or <width> or <depth> is not empty and the associated <measurementUnitCode> equals ''CMT', then its associated value shall not have more than 1 decimal position.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <height> or <width> or <depth> is not empty and the associated <measurementUnitCode> equals ''MMT'', then its associated value shall not have a decimal position.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <priceComparisonContentTypeCode> equals 'PER_KILOGRAM' and <netWeight> is populated, then <priceComparisonMeasurement> and <netWeight> shall be equivalent.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <priceComparisonContentTypeCode> equals 'DRAINED_WEIGHT' and <drainedWeight> is populated, then <priceComparisonMeasurement> and <drainedWeight> shall be equivalent.
<udidFirstPublicationDateTime> shall be today's date or in the future.
<udidFirstPublicationDateTime> shall not be changed once the current populated date has been reached.

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals 'PALLET' and <platformTypeCode> equals '49', then <depth> shall be between and including ('610 MMT' or '24.02 IN') and ('1220 MMT' or '48.04 IN') and <width> shall be between and including ('508 MMT' or '20 IN') and ('1016 MMT' or '40 IN').

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals 'PALLET' and <platformTypeCode> equals '48', then <depth> shall be between and including ('610 MMT' or '24.02 IN') and ('1220 MMT' or '48.04 IN') and <width> shall be between and including ('1016 MMT' or '40 IN') and ('2032 MMT' or '80 IN').

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals 'PALLET' and <platformTypeCode> equals '47', then <depth> shall be between and including ('400 MMT' or '15.75 IN') and ('800 MMT' or '31.5 IN'), and <width> shall be between and including ( '800 MMT' or '31.50 IN) and ('1600 MMT' or '63 IN').

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals 'PALLET' and <platformTypeCode> equals '43', then <depth> shall be between and including ('1140 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2280 MMT' or '86.62 IN') and <width> shall be between and including ('1140 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2280 MMT' or '86.62 IN').

If <targetMarketCountryCode> equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and <tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode> equals 'PALLET' and <platformTypeCode> equals '42', then <depth> shall bebetween and including ('1100 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2200 MMT' or '86.62 IN') and <width> shall be between and including ('1100 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2200 MMT' or '86.62 IN').

The value for level of containment code is not valid; the allowed values are 'CONTAINS', 'FREE_FROM', 'MAY_CONTAIN' for the target market.
The drained weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM' or 'GRM' for the target market.

The quantity contained unit of measurement shall be 'GRM' in case the nutrient type code is 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'FAMSCIS', 'FAPUCIS', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'FIBTG', 'SALTEQ', 'SUGAR-', 'POLYL' or 'STARCH' for the target market.
The value of percentage of daily value intake shall be greater than or equal to 0 (zero).
The percentage of alcohol by volume shall have the same value in all levels of this hierarchy for the target market.
The degree of original wort shall have the same value in all levels of this hierarchy for the target market.
An instance of preparation instructions with the language code 'nl' shall be filled out in case preparation state code is filled out with 'PREPARED' and at least one nutrient type code is filled out.

An instance of provenance statement with the language code 'nl' shall be filled out for target market Netherlands in case regulatory product name is filled out and the gpc category code equals 10005786.
You should fill out the field quantity contained because you used the field nutrient type code for this target market.

Daily value intake reference shall be filled out in case the nutrient type code equals 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'ENER-', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'SUGAR-' or 'SALTEQ' and daily value intake percent is filled out for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FASAT', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAMSCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAPUCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'STARCH', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' within the same group, for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'POLYL', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' within the same group, for the target market.

If nutrient type code is filled out with 'SUGAR-', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' for the legally required nutritional table within the same group, for the target market.

The amount of nutrient type code 'NA' multiplied by 2.5 may not deviate more than 10% from the amount of nutrient type code SALTEQ with identical unit of measure in case of consumer units and a <measurementPrecisionCode> not equal to 'LESS_THAN' for target market Netherlands.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, if Global Product Category Code <gpcCategoryCode> is in GPC Segment '92000000' (<Haulage> Containers), then Packaging Marked Returnable Indicator <isPackagingMarkedReturnable> must not be 'TRUE'.
Is packaging marked returnable shall be populated for the target market in case of packed fresh fruits and vegetables.
Drained weight shall be greater than 0 (zero).
Drained weight shall not be used, if packaging type code is equal to 'NE' (Not packed).
Number of smallest units per package shall be greater than 0 (zero).
The <<nutrientTypeCode>> nutrient type code used is not allowed in the target market.
The sum of the quantity contained values for nutrient type codes 'FAT', 'PRO-' and 'CHOAVL' exceeds 100 gram.
If preparation state code is used, then regulated product name should be used as well for consumer units.
For batteries the field quantity of batteries built-in shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If quantity of batteries built in is not required, please do not populate.
For batteries the field quantity of batteries included shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not included, please do not populate.
For batteries the field quantity of batteries required shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not required, please do not populate.
For batteries the field Battery weight shall be greater than 0 (zero), if used.
Battery weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM', 'GRM' or 'MGM'.
For a Nutrient Header class, the Nutrient <<nutrientTypeCode>> and Measurement Precision Code <<measurementPrecisionCode>> must be unique.
Only one <gtin> within a hierarchy can have <isTradeItemUDIDILevel> set to 'TRUE'.
Only one <gtin> within a hierarchy can have <isTradeItemUnitOfUse> set to 'TRUE'.

If all of following three attributes are provided, then gross weight of a Non-GTIN Logistic Unit <grossWeight> must be greater than 96 % of Trade Item's Gross Weight <grossWeight> multiplied by the Quantity Of Trade Items Per Pallet <quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet>.
The attribute <additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode> with value '76' EU Regulation <IVDR> Risk class is not repeatable.
The attribute <additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode> with value '85' EU Directive <IVDD> Risk class is not repeatable.
<nutritionalScore> shall not be used, if <nutritionalProgramCode> equals '8' (Nutri-Score) and <nutritionalProgramStatusCode> equals 'NOT_REGISTERED'.

If GTIN for Point of Sale <gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue> or GTIN for Point of Sale Type Code <gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode> is used, then both shall be used.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, if Display Ready Packaging <hasDisplayReadyPackaging> equals 'TRUE', then Despatch Unit Indicator <isTradeItemADespatchUnit> SHALL equal 'TRUE'.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name>, at least one iteration of Customs Classification Type Code <importClassificationTypeCode> must equal 'INTRASTAT' or 'TARIF_INTEGRE_DE_LA_COMMUNAUTE'.

For Country of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode> <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name> and Customs Classification Value <importClassificationValue> <<importClassificationValue> value>, attribute Regulation Type Code <regulationTypeCode> must equal 'DEFORESTATION_REGULATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator <isTradeItemRegulationCompliant> must equal 'TRUE' in the same iteration.

For Country of Sale Code (<targetMarketCountryCode>) <<targetMarketCountryCode> Country name> and Customs Classification Value (<importClassificationValue>) <<importClassificationValue> value>, attribute Regulation Type Code (<regulationTypeCode>) must equal 'DEFORESTATION_REGULATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator (<isTradeItemRegulationCompliant>) must equal 'TRUE' or 'NOT_APPLICABLE' in the same iteration.​
<gln> shall equal <dataSource>, <contentOwner> and <informationProvider> and shall be the same for all levels of trade item hierarchy.
If <incotermCodeLocation> is not empty then <incotermCode> must not be empty.
If <gpcCategoryCode> is used, then its value shall be in the list of official GPC bricks as published by GS1 and currently adopted in production by GDSN.
If attribute datatype is equal to <gtin> then it must have a valid check digit.
If attribute datatype equals <gln> then it must be a 13 digit number and have a valid check digit.
If data type is equal to <gtin> then attribute value must be a valid GTIN-8, GTIN-12, GTIN-13 or GTIN-14 number.
There must be at most 100 Documents per transaction.
GRAI must have a valid check digit.
Code value 'D_A' (Development Assistance) and '001' (GLOBAL MARKET) shall only be used for <targetMarketCountryCode>.
There shall be at most one value of <languageSpecificPartyName> for each language.
